behavior fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink:item, soap:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        achieve has_water(sink)
        achieve has_water(soap)
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        bind soap: item where:
            is_soap(soap)
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
        fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink, soap, faucet)

def locate_bathroom(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is in the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and locate_bathroom(sink):
            # If there is a sink in the bathroom that we have already located, approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and locate_bathroom(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
        
        else:
            # Check all unvisited sinks
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink,"Locate sink in bathroom")

def is_bathroom_related(item: item):
    # Determines if the item is related to the bathroom task such as sink or faucet
    symbol related=exists y: item : (is_faucet(y) or is_sink(y)) and (close(item, y) or inside(item,
 y))
    return related

def has_faucet(sink: item):
    # Determine if the sink has a faucet nearby
    symbol faucet_exists=exists faucet: item : is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return faucet_exists

behavior add_soap_to_water(sink: item, soap: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            rinse(soap)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and has_water(sink)
        # Select the sink with water
        
        bind soap: item where:
            is_soap(soap) and is_bathroom_related(soap)
        # Select an instance of soap related to the bathroom
        
        add_soap_to_water(sink, soap)
